pullRequest.title: Added HMS Notif Open Activity
pullRequest.bodyText:
This is the entry point when tapping on a HMS core notification
This has to be it's own Activity separate from NotificationOpenedActivity
since we do not have full control over the Bundle



This change is

nodes.bodyText: can we remove this enters? or are we changing the convention?
FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_WHEN_TASK_RESET is deprecated, and why is needed?
this combination Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_MULTIPLE_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK is forcing to always create a new task, can this lead to having 2 instances at the same time?
this class should test everything around notifications? how will this operate with notifications tracking etc? should we test that?

commit.message:
Added HMS Notif Open Activity

* This is the entry point when tapping on a HMS core notification
* This has to be it's own Activity separate from NotificationOpenedActivity
since we do not have full control over the Bundle

Added HMS open integration tests

* Covers empty intent
* Bare bones OneSignal paylaod
* IAM Preview
Test for HMS notification open REST API call

Adding manifest entries for HMS classes

* Added notification open handling

Correct NotificationOpenedActivityHMS intent flags

* Removed used of deperated flag
* Added more comments on why the specific flags are needed.
